price: This [Qur’an] is surely a glory[15] for you and your people, and you will [all] be questioned.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ
footnotes: [15] i.e., an honor or a reminder.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
